pros: Contains a good supply of vitamin D3
Though not designed to increase breast milk, some customers experience increased supply
cons: Includes folic acid instead of “folate”  listed in ingredients online
Some strongly averse to smell and taste

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive ingredient list online
customer_reviews.text: The ingredient list shown is deceptive. The actual ingredient list includes folic acid, although the picture online states that there is folate in the vitamins. I am disappointed that the ingredient list shown is not the ingredient list that matches the actual product that came. I will be returning. For anyone familiar with the MTHFR gene mutation this is a bigger deal than some may realize.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Gentle iron and great nursing multivitamin
customer_reviews.text: My prenatal vitamins caused a dip in my milk supply so I found these and tried them. I have been used them now for 6 or 7 months and I love them. Unlike many other multivitamins, the iron does not upset my stomach and the level of Vitamin D is sufficient enough for me to not need a secondary one. I supplement these with DHA and magnesium glycinate and have never had issues with stomach upset in myself or my baby. It is important to note that these do NOT have galactogogues in them (the nursing support blend does) so they are safe to use if you have an oversupply.
customer_reviews.author: HB

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!! Highly recommended!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was taking these when my son was first born and then amazon ran out of stock. After about a month and not having sufficient time to pump at work my supply dipped to almost nonexistent. Luckily amazon had gotten more instock. I began taking them as soon as they came in and my supply increased ten fold the next day! It has been a stead supply since! Thank you Milkies for this amazing product!
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: ❤️ love ❤️
customer_reviews.text: I love these multivitamins! I didn’t want to give my baby vitamin D supplement when I was breastfeeding... did my research... found out breast milk has vitamin d in it if the mother isn’t low on it herself. So I looked for a postnatal vitamin high in Vitamin D... this is the only multi vitamin with an extremely high amount of vitamin d. I highly recommend to anyone who wants to/ is breastfeeding.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Stomach Upset
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like these more. Sorry. But- you HAVE to take them with food. If you're like me and have IBS, please head caution. I felt so nauseous like I was going to heave, I had to get up from my desk and scour the fridge for food. Other pre/postnatals don't do this to me. (They even say, "gentle on stomach"). New Chapter and Rainbow Light with the digestive blends are game-changers. The nutrients packed in this Milkies brand seem very decent, but I was still losing hair and breaking nails left and right. Pay a little more money and get a five-star product.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Good product, confusing labels
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Milkies NURSING BLEND. Without realizing it I purchased this product, Milkies NURSING POSTNATAL because of the similarities in name and label. While there was no problem with the NURSING POSTNATAL multivitamin, I did see a drop in breast milk production going from the NURSING BLEND to the NURSING POSTNATAL. The NURSING POSTNATAL, is a vitamin but with no added galactagogues. It’s unclear whether the NURSING BLEND is a multivitamin or just designed to boost milk production. I think they could improve their labels to be more informative.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne

customer_reviews.title: Nausea inducing!!
customer_reviews.text: I have never felt nausea like I have when taking these vitamins. I almost had to pull my car over one morning I was so sick from these pills. I had not one ounce of nausea my entire pregnancy, then I get it from some vitamin AFER baby is here?! No thanks!! Prenatals never even made me feel sick! There’s something up with these. Skip them and buy a reputable brand name.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: To me they don’t taste like anything. I do make sure to take them ...
customer_reviews.text: Been taking them for a month now. I was very anemic after giving birth. I took these and an additional iron supplement and was able to get my iron stores back up quickly. To me they don’t taste like anything. I do make sure to take them with food (no calcium) because supplements with iron can upset the stomach. My nails and hair have been growing like crazy. Even more now then when I was preggo!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew o.

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: Ever since I started taking these, not only was my milk supply starting to suffer, but I'm actually drying up! Not pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey T

customer_reviews.title: Give more energy when you need it!
customer_reviews.text: Got rid of my gummi prenatals and tried these and noticed a significant difference. They are easy on my stomach while most with iron are not and I feel more level headed. Buying again.
customer_reviews.author: JoeandBritt

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite!!! When I’m taking these I don’t get as tired breastfeeding. My hair feels more healthy as well. Breastfeeding twins takes a toll on my body but these helped me so much!
customer_reviews.author: Larenzo Earvin

customer_reviews.title: Not sure how much this is working
customer_reviews.text: I like the ease of this supplement and the herbs included in the ingredients list. However it is hard to tell if it actually helping to produce more milk. On days when I forgot to take it, it did appear that my supply was any less.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I wish I'd known about it almost 5 years ago!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome! I took it to the hospital when I went in for my c-section in June. I took it the day after our son was born and within HOURS my breasts were full! On top of drinking lots (and lots and lots...) of water, I take one in the morning and one in the evening.
customer_reviews.author: BlessedSouthernMama15

customer_reviews.title: Works for hair growth
customer_reviews.text: This definitely made my baby hairs grow. I didn't notice a boost in milk compared to other products.
customer_reviews.author: Skrall

customer_reviews.title: More energy throughout the day!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about this since it hasn’t been approved by the FDA but it has been great! I have more energy and it seems as if my supply has gone up a tad! And for the people who are saying this pill smells horrible.... they just must be sensitive to smells because it’s truly not bad at all!
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Muck

customer_reviews.title: Boost milk supply
customer_reviews.text: Getting my nutrients, definitely can tell when my milk supply is up or down if I forget to take. Plus I’m a fan of the price compared to other post natal vitamins out there.
customer_reviews.author: laurie

customer_reviews.title: Great product, they work!
customer_reviews.text: Tastes like dirt and herbs, but I’ve been using them for 4 months and they help my breastmilk supply! I wouldn’t take them on an empty stomach (kind of like any pill).
customer_reviews.author: Dakota B.

customer_reviews.title: I recommend
customer_reviews.text: It has helped with my lactation supply augmentation. My baby is happy and so am I.
customer_reviews.author: Oroshun

customer_reviews.title: Don’t take on empty stomach.
customer_reviews.text: These vitamins settle well with my body but cannot take on an empty stomach or even immediately after eating. I wait 30min or more after eating before taking them and then it’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Rae

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful! So worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I feel great taking this multivitamin. I felt as if I needed something more than prenatal after having my son. These are great!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Goebel

customer_reviews.title: Great vitamins!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to order these based on the reviews that mentioned them having a strong smell. I personally have not encountered that at all with these. Glad to be able to take a vitamin tailored to nursing moms instead of just continuing my prenatal!
customer_reviews.author: Bianca B

customer_reviews.title: This is a great postnatal!
customer_reviews.text: I like this product! I am a breastfeeding mom and needed extra vitamins to catch back up! These have really helped me to feel better!
customer_reviews.author: Esther Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t a big fan of the taste and felt like they hurt my supply more than helped it. I know it’s strictly vitamins, but I still felt it hurt more than helped
customer_reviews.author: jojo

customer_reviews.title: Do you really need this?
customer_reviews.text: We got this product and my wife didn’t particularly take this consistently. The milk flow didn’t really change and she wasn’t sure if she needed the supplement.
customer_reviews.author: KenGsaur

customer_reviews.title: Horrible fishy smell and taste
customer_reviews.text: These vitamins are some of the nastiest things I’ve ever consumed. They have a very strong fishy odor, and even when swallowed quickly with lots of water have a very strong fishy taste and after taste.
customer_reviews.author: EMay

customer_reviews.title: Feeling Great
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking these and feeling great. Breast feeding takes a lot from you. Once I added these to my vitamin regimen I had so much energy.
customer_reviews.author: Sparkle Style

customer_reviews.title: Essential vitamins for breastfeeding mothers
customer_reviews.text: When I started my breastfeeding journey I continued taking my prenatal vitamins but felt that they were lacking for the energy I needed to feed my little boy. I have noticed a difference in my mood and energy levels since starting these. I’ve definitely felt a boost in happiness and energy!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Huge Decrease In Supply
customer_reviews.text: Practically dried up my supply in 2 weeks!! I’m struggling to get back what used to be an oversupply! I’m so bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Charlcielynn

customer_reviews.title: These are really complete and contain Vitamin D so that ...
customer_reviews.text: These are really complete and contain Vitamin D so that gives me peace of mind that I'm passing it to my baby through my milk. I have no complaints on the smell that I've read about on other reviews, there really is almost no smell at all. I've been taking these supplements for 2 months now and no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: B-S-S

customer_reviews.title: Great lactation support
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Have used to assist in maintaining milk supply for nursing 3 children now. I can definitely tell a difference when using this supplement.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Seem good (never had issues with my milk
customer_reviews.text: I bought these when my prenatal was out of stock. Seem good (never had issues with my milk, anyway) but wish there was more to them. I like how they are in capsules and that you take 2 a day. I take one in morning and one at night.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need while nursing
customer_reviews.text: A very good vitamin. I took off one star due to the taste.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Great postnatals!
customer_reviews.text: These postnatal vitamins are great. They are easy to swallow, don't cause nausea and don't leave a nasty after taste. I also really like how high the vitamin D content is. Great overall value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Great for nursing mothers.
customer_reviews.text: I like these vitamins because they seem to have a higher daily value % per vitamin. Compared to other vitamins.... I also didn't find many that were POST Natal. Most are Pre N. That was important to me because I'm nursing and know my baby is getting all the nutrients she needs from me.
customer_reviews.author: INunez

customer_reviews.title: Fenugreek free (thank you)
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be good. Very easy to take, no bad vitamin flavor and easy on my stomach. Can’t say it helps productivity but glad vitamin is tailored to breastfeeding and doesn’t contain fenugreek!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Makes my wife feel nauseous even having something in her stomach. She had to stop using it.

customer_reviews.title: Great choice.  Great price.
customer_reviews.text: These vitamins don’t give me a headache or any aftertaste.
customer_reviews.author: THughes

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, its affordable and is formulated for the extra needs of a nursing mother. Although I still take extra vitamin d so I dont have to give drops to my baby, i dont have to take as much because this has extra vitamin D.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Benefits
customer_reviews.text: Switched to the nursing postnatals a week ago and feel like I have alot more energy especially Exclusively Breastfeeding. Also compared to other postnatal vitamins, these have more vitamins.
customer_reviews.author: katelyn

customer_reviews.title: Breastfeeding saver!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to swallow and doesn’t hurt my stomach. Definitely helped with milk supply. Must have for breastfeeding.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I noticed an increase in supply immediately. Hoping it stays this way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smelly
customer_reviews.text: They had a smell that made it difficult for me to take the pills.
customer_reviews.author: kalanit

customer_reviews.title: These vitamins work!
customer_reviews.text: Love these vitamins. Definitely helped my hair and nails grow and I feel like it helped my milk supply. Will continue to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: C.S

customer_reviews.title: I really like that they dont make me sick like other vitamins ...
customer_reviews.text: The pills smell a bit weird but all prenatals do. I really like that they dont make me sick like other vitamins I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: Shayla

customer_reviews.title: I don’t like the after taste
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like that when I burp I can taste the pills. Not sure how well they work since I just started taking them today.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comprehensive vitamin, everything in one, just add dha if you want
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: The capsules smell like protein powder
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure how to feel about it. The capsules smell like protein powder... not like other vitamins I've taken... I wonder if they are really what they are advertising to be.
customer_reviews.author: Ximena Llanos

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Love these!! It’s just great knowing that all of the good things I take in from these all go straight to my breastfeeding one year old :)
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great vitamin
customer_reviews.text: Great vitamin, and not too much iron (so not hard on the stomach). I compared carefully with other prenatal and postnatals, and this seems to be a great mix. No problems with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ajohns

customer_reviews.title: The smell is terrible. Very unappetizing
customer_reviews.text: I haven't noticed a different between this and my nature made vitamins. The smell is terrible. Very unappetizing. They don't make me sick though, so that's good.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Low supply still
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I didn't notice a difference in my supply at all..
customer_reviews.author: tiffani oliveto

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This has been great with my recovery and making me feel more like myself!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This supplement had the most recommended vitamins for breastfeeding. Just started taking them and have no complaints.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best vitamins found for both myself and my baby. Milk supply is great now.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Camacho

customer_reviews.title: Other than that it's great!
customer_reviews.text: I have to take it with food, otherwise I get really nauseous. Other than that it's great!
customer_reviews.author: pckl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very prompt delivery and I do feel like the vitamins gave me more energy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great multivitamin
customer_reviews.text: Loves that it has the folic acid, vitamin D, and iron I need in one product
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Leverette

customer_reviews.title: A bit deceiving
customer_reviews.text: Not what I thought I was ordering. From what I had read online and seen on Amazon the nursing blend was to increase breastmilk production. I intended to get, and thought I was purchasing, the postnatal nursing blend WITH the additional herbs to help increase milk production, but these were just the postnatal vitamin. A bit deceiving. I just got them today, so hopefully they're at least good vitamins.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great vitamin. I never expected it to increase my ...
customer_reviews.text: A great vitamin. I never expected it to increase my milk supply (it didn't), but my mood and energy has been helped by these vitamins and I know that I'm supplementing where I am missing in my diet. I don't get the nasty smell/taste that others have complained about. The one thing I did learn the hard way, was that you cannot take them on an empty stomach! I made that mistake and within 5 min of taking them, I got very nauseous and threw up. I will continue to purchase
customer_reviews.author: KristiS

customer_reviews.title: These have an interesting smell but medically highly recommended. I struggled to take prenatals during my pregnancy ...
customer_reviews.text: These have an interesting smell but medically highly recommended. I struggled to take prenatals during my pregnancy as them made me extremely sick (I had HG) but these postpartum have no side effects. I didn't try them as prenatals as that's not their purpose. I just wish them sold more then a months supply in a bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay J

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It's really hard to know if a vitamin is doing it's job because how are you supposed to know? They don't smell the greatest or taste the greatest if they linger in your mouth. Also don't take on an empty stomach. I took them on an empty stomach one morning and in about 15 minutes I just about threw up except I had nothing in my stomach yet. I felt awful until I ate something. I haven't felt that way since and I always make sure that I eat something with it.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: everytime i take it i feel sick((( i think it just doesn't work for me personally
customer_reviews.author: Alisa

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to like these. I had no idea that there were ...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like these. I had no idea that there were postnatal vitamins until recently, and I've been breastfeeding for over a year. These definitely do have a funky smell. I can bear it, but I'm not a fan. Plus you have to take two of them per day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yuck!
customer_reviews.text: This vitamin made me stink. Within two days of switching to another brand of postnatal vitamin the stink was completely gone. Do yourself (and those around you) a favor and buy another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Lawr949

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I love that these vitamins have so much vitamin D. A doctor I work with has been studying all the important things Vitamin D does for us and how deficient most of us are.
customer_reviews.author: mcs1505

customer_reviews.title: I think they work
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking these since I had my daughter and they seem to do the job. I haven't had any trouble with my milk supply.
customer_reviews.author: Sheron Wingate

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this vitamin! I wish I would have found this product with our first child!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made me sick
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't take this without it making me sick. Didn't matter what time of day, with or without food, nothing helped. I vomited within 30 minutes of taking it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Hackney

customer_reviews.title: approved) and i did just fine on it
customer_reviews.text: I used thw following products together: - milkies nursing blend to increase milk supply - milkies nursing tea time - milkies nursing postnatal breastfeeding multivitamin I started taking the multivitamins 2 weeks before baby was born (dr. approved) and i did just fine on it. One month after baby was born i wanted to increase my supply and ordered the tea and the supply increase pills. Two weeks later on these and my milk supply dried out!!! Thank God for Amazon and their amazing customer service, i was able to return all of them and get my money back. I DO NOT recommend Milkies!!! *i posted this same review for the other two products discussed here*
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: No aftertaste and is worth trying
customer_reviews.text: Previous products of postnatal vitamins that I have bought left an after taste and made me feel nauseated. This particular product seems to make me feel great, leaves no after taste and I seem to not feel ill. I am pleased with the result. I was also thankful that there is something on the market that is tailored for a nursing mom like me. I am pleased with this product and happy that I tried it.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan Bussell

customer_reviews.title: Great vitamin for the price
customer_reviews.text: I really love this vitamins, they go down easy and have not effected my babies sleep like some women had reviewed. I do take them in the morning for energy vs at night. Overall I'm satisfied, I have more energy and don't feel so run down. This is the first post natal vitamin I have seen that includes extra vitamin d for baby through the milk and that was really impressive to me. I'm not a fan of giving baby suppliaments so this is perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Definitely working!
customer_reviews.text: These vitamins worked great for me. It’s hard to tell how effective a vitamin is but this is my experience. Excuse me for TMI but my newborn’s poop was green and I did all the tricks to get more hind milk but still WEEKS of green. I had stopped taking any vitamins but then I decided to order these. Within a few days.. normal mustard poop again. I occasionally forget to take my vitamins and it’s back to green. That’s a pretty solid sign to me that it’s giving my baby the nutrients I lack.. and I eat really healthy!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Not a winner.
customer_reviews.text: These vitamins stink (literally)! I keep trying to make myself take these so I don’t waste my money, but they give me a terrible stomach ache. I cut back to just taking one a day, but they still upset my stomach. Horrible smelling vitamin that also leaves an aftertaste. I’m very disappointed. I take vitamins a lot, but these will not be a product that I order again.
customer_reviews.author: StephyL

customer_reviews.title: Thank goodness for this product
customer_reviews.text: absolutely love this product. It is difficult to find vitamins catered to postnatal moms, let alone ones safe for breatsfeeding. I appreciate that this not only supports my ability to produce milk, but also contains high quality, methylated b vitamins, to boost my energy. I only wish you didn't have to take two for a whole serving, which makes a month's worth a bit pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Mansager

customer_reviews.title: Easy 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: After trying this once I ordered 4 or 5 more bottles! It's great while nursing, lots of vitamin d and helped me post partum I believe! I will continue to buy until I'm done breastfeeding

customer_reviews.title: horsey smell

customer_reviews.author: Faithie Flower

customer_reviews.title: these actually work

customer_reviews.title: Good!

customer_reviews.author: Stacey L Wright

customer_reviews.title: Great vitamin but I wish it came in a larger ...
customer_reviews.text: Great vitamin but I wish it came in a larger size. The directions recommend taking 2 per serving so this bottle only lasts 2 weeks.This is one of the only vitamins I can find that is for postnatal and doesn't include additional vitamins for milk supply.
customer_reviews.author: MJ Van

product_meta.title: Nursing Postnatal Breastfeeding Multivitamin
feature_bullets: Recommended Use: Take 2 capsules daily as a dietary supplement.
Each bottle contains 60 capsules, a 1-month supply.
Contains a comprehensive array of vitamins and minerals, including 700% Daily Value of Vitamin D and 200% Daily Value of Vitamins B1, B2, B3, B6, B12 and biotin.
All-natural and safe - contains no artificial dyes or colors, flavors or preservatives. Recommended by the American Pregnancy Association.
